summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-based Google review system. Backend APIs working perfectly (8/8 tests passed). Frontend UI and core functionality working well. AI review generation producing high-quality authentic reviews. Google login flow successfully redirects to Emergent auth service. Main issues: CORS configuration and QR code URL generation using localhost instead of production URL.

configuration_issues.issue: CORS policy blocks requests with credentials when using wildcard '*' origin
configuration_issues.impact: Prevents authenticated API calls from frontend
configuration_issues.details: Backend CORS_ORIGINS='*' conflicts with withCredentials=true in frontend requests

configuration_issues.issue: Backend generates localhost:3000 URLs instead of production URLs
configuration_issues.impact: QR codes point to localhost instead of production domain
configuration_issues.details: FRONTEND_URL environment variable not set correctly in backend

integration_issues.issue: CORS errors when making authenticated requests to backend

passed_tests: Business registration form (name, Google Place ID, owner email)
Review page loads correctly via QR code link
AI review generation from keywords and rating (excellent quality)
Google login flow redirects to Emergent auth service
All backend API endpoints (8/8 tests passed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix CORS configuration in backend to allow specific origins instead of wildcard when using credentials. Set FRONTEND_URL environment variable in backend to production URL (https://easygoogle-review.preview.emergentagent.com) instead of localhost for proper QR code generation.
